languages.text: {n}Теодора шипит — почти болезненно, словно ваши слова ранят ее.{/n} "Сопротивление неизбежному значит лишь одно — осознание и подчинение принесут больше боли. Против токов судьбы нет силы, способной изменить их".

{n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."
languages.original_text: {n}Теодора шипит — почти болезненно, словно ваши слова ранят ее.{/n} "Сопротивление неизбежному значит лишь одно — осознание и подчинение принесут больше боли. Против токов судьбы нет силы, способной изменить их".

{n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉几乎发出了痛苦的嘶叫声，你的话似乎对它造成了伤害。{/n}“抵抗不可避免的结果，只会为你带来更多的痛苦与折磨。你终将服从于命运，没有任何力量可以阻挡命运的流动。”
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个实体几乎发出了痛苦的嘶叫声，你的话似乎对它造成了伤害。{/n}“抵抗不可避免的结果，只会为你带来更多的痛苦与折磨。你终将服从于命运，没有任何力量可以阻挡命运的流动。”

languages.text: {n}Theodora sisea casi con dolor, como si tus palabras la hubieran herido.{/n} «Resistir lo inevitable solo significa que la comprensión y la rendición conllevarán un tormento mayor. Ningún poder puede resistir el flujo del destino».
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura sisea casi con dolor, como si tus palabras la hubieran herido.{/n} «Resistir lo inevitable solo significa que la comprensión y la rendición conllevarán un tormento mayor. Ningún poder puede resistir el flujo del destino».

languages.text: {n}シオドーラは苦痛のこもった音を立てて言う。まるであなたの言葉に傷つけられたかのようだ。{/n}「避けられないものに抵抗することは、それに気づき服従することがより大きな苦しみをもたらす。運命の流れを妨げられる力などない」
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}その生き物は激しい息遣いで「シュー」と音を出す。まるであなたの言葉に傷つけられたかのようだ。{/n}「避けられないものに抵抗するのは、それに気づき服従することがより大きな苦しみをもたらす。運命の流れを妨げられる力はない」
{n}シオドーラは苦痛のこもった音を立てて言う。まるであなたの言葉に傷つけられたかのようだ。{/n}「避けられないものに抵抗することは、それに気づき服従することがより大きな苦しみをもたらす。運命の流れを妨げられる力などない」

languages.text: {n}Théodora siffle presque douloureusement, comme si vos mots l'avaient blessée.{/n} « Résister à l'inévitable ne fait qu'alourdir le tourment apporté par la prise de conscience et la soumission. Aucun pouvoir ne peut entraver le flux du destin. »
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature siffle presque douloureusement, comme si vos mots l'avaient blessée.{/n} « Résister à l'inévitable ne fait qu'alourdir le tourment apporté par la prise de conscience et la soumission. Aucun pouvoir ne peut entraver le flux du destin. »

languages.text: {n}Theodora zischt, als hätten deine Worte sie verwundet.{/n} "Sich dem Unvermeidlichen zu widersetzen, führt lediglich dazu, dass Erkenntnis und Aufgabe qualvoller werden. Keine Macht kann den Fluss des Schicksals aufhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kreatur zischt wie getroffen, als hätten deine Worte sie verwundet.{/n} "Sich dem Unvermeidlichen zu widersetzen, führt lediglich dazu, dass Erkenntnis und Aufgabe qualvoller werden. Keine Macht kann den Fluss des Schicksals aufhalten."

languages.text: {n}Theodora neredeyse acı çeker gibi, sanki sözlerin onu yaralamışçasına tıslıyor.{/n} "Kaçınılmaz olana direnerek, farkına varıp da teslim olunca çekeceğin azabı artırırsın. Kaderin gidişatına mâni olabilecek hiçbir güç yoktur."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora hisses almost painfully, as if wounded by your words.{/n} "Resisting the inevitable means only that realisation and submission will bring greater torment. There is no power that can hinder the flows of fate."
